status_updates.description:
üë®‚Äçüíª Web app V 0.0.7 is live - Favorite token list on left hand column, 1-click load of whale transactions for any token.

üì∫ TG channel @pancakewhales is live. Tracking PancakeSwap on Binance Smart Chain. This channel is free for everyone. 

In the coming weeks, we will add a BSC dashboard which will be exclusively for pro members.

Web app V 1.0.0 is live!

Our biggest update yet!

Also we are joining Rari Capital on the 88MPH Discord tomorrow, Thursday at 1PM EST

#1 Uniswap and Sushiswap transactions are now integrated on the web app for both whale and token analysis.

#2 Our most popular premium Telegram channel "New / Unknown tokens, now has it's own dashboard inside the web app. 

#3 **RedPhonshipSaurus**
AKA The ultimate DeFi degen dashboard.

Coming soon to the UniWhales WebApp.

*UniWhales (UWL) is now in the Onsen Program - SushiSwap
*SushiSwap volume now being reported in CoinGecko
*Web app V 0.0.3 is Live
*First whale channel "power brokers" going live tomorrow
*Did an exclusive webinar for the DAO with 0xMaki on SushiSwap and DeFi in 2021

We are excited for 2021. Going to be a great year.

Web App V 0.0.1 is LIVE

Take a look 1 min demo can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lESgiY3sKM&feature=youtu.be

app.uniwhales.io

With the recent YFI collaboration, upcoming BentoBox product, and feedback from the UniWhales DAO, we have decided to invest in a new telegram channel:

SushiSwap large swaps and Liquidity Provider adds/removes.

Will be available for premium members. 

Release date: Mid-December.

Also, we expect the web app in the next 7 days.
